content.text: This is an data form cell with a list element. Here we have defined it as a non-multitype list format.

This is a data form cell. In the form, we have added a list element. We only defined a single list element type, the text area, but we defined it as a multiple list, unlike the above example. Because of this, the value looks different, including the key for each entry.
Here is the value of the form:

Here we add an initialized value, an empty string. This leaves an unpopulated element text area there. (We might want another way to do this. It works for the text area, but it might not for some others.)
